titleStmt.title: A full answer to a scandalous pamphlet, intituled, A character of a London diurnall.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F.P. for Francis Coles and Lawrence Blaikeloke, and are to be sold at their shops, in the Old-Bayly, and at Temple-Barre.,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Cleveland, John. The character of a London diurnall (Wing C4659).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
